name: Presidential Driver
description:
Presidential Driver is a Singleplayer 2D-Action-Platformer, in which players control a Character in an upwards going Level. While playing, Players have to kill opponents with a stun to make them vulnerable and jump on their head to kill them in order to proceed through the level to finally winning the game by reaching the top of the level. The game addresses players with a competitive mindset and speedrunning communities.

Visit our website for more information.
